Otherwise, it's wonderful and we love it!we would love to completely give up our cable, which is what we were hoping for.  Have to have the local news, etc.  Thanks

review: Great search tool without having to type in selections. I have to say its more like a Roku on steroids. Easy to navigate easy with great interface.

review: The Amazon fire works just fine. I also have the Apple TV 3 and the Roku player. Games set the Amazon fire apart and above so be sure to pick up a couple game controllers. Only downside is it's fairly expensive when you add on two of the game controllers.

review: I can watch everything on my TV screen instead of my kindle fire or computer. Love the voice search. So easy to usee

review: I've been a prime member since prime started.  I never really worried about using my membership to watch tv shows or movies until I purchased this this thing!It's super quick with almost zero buffering, even with an OK internet connection & the amount of shows included with your membership is great.I'm just hoping that the gaming section gets better!
